0.0.15.en: fix bug saving last request in adapter configuration / improve debug messages

0.0.14.en: update package.json and install new tools for stream encoding/decoding detection / implement encoding detection and stream encoding / change the ejs lib with a real browserified lib

0.0.13.en: new widget as a guest, because it is not directly related to the rssfeed functionality, but reuse the same code base. maybe later i transfer it to an own adapter. the new widget can take a json datapoint and you can visualize the data with the ejs template system.

0.0.12.en: now you can download the adapter configuration in the admin dialog

0.0.11.en: improve admin layout / implement a forceRefresh button

0.0.10.en: fix bug a bug in marquee widget. not all styles should applied to the span tag

0.0.9.en: apply widget styles also to the inner span element, because they had not any effect on the marquee / renew the package-lock.json / add categories to save feeds in subfolders / improve mechanism to write only updated feeds to datapoint. the feed has new data if comparision of articles in title and description is different.

0.0.8.en: improve lasrequest logic of the adapter, fix problem with datapoint naming

0.0.7.en: test with encapsulation of ejs.js, becaus of error in some browsers

0.0.6.en: add attribute duration for widget marquee to control animation duration

0.0.5.en: new widget marquee for article titles, add filter function for articles. the filter searchs in title,description and categories, seceral filter criteria can be seperated by semicolon

0.0.2.en: added widgets meta helper and article helper

desc.es: Adaptador y widget de visualización para feeds rss
desc.pl: Adapter i widżet Vis dla kanałów RSS
